column6:
From the first day that I put these tights on I have been LOVING them (and still do). They have been very comfy and I enjoy working out in them, as well as running errands.
The problem is that after multiple washings I've started to notice the thinning of the knit material and today I noticed a tiny hole right on the knee. I was upset but didn't pay that much attention to it but by the time I came home after a long day I noticed a HUGE hole that continued to rip even more.
At this point the leggings are no longer wearable and I am not sure the hole can be sewn back together. I'm very disappoint because this has been one of my absolute favorite pair of Lulu leggings that I can no longer wear! :(
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear fitstyle12,\n\nThank you for taking the time to review the Speed Up Tight *28". We\'d like to turn this around and ensure your gear is providing long lasting performance for you. Since it sounds like this isn\'t the case, please keep an eye on your inbox so we can get to work on a solution for you!', 'LL_response_date': 'February 8, 2019'}

column6:
Found these tights on sale and debated about buying them; read all the reviews, and decided I'd give it a shot. So glad I did! In fact, I went back and got another sale pair! They may be a bit snugger than other leggings, but for me, that's perfect. I ordered my normal size, and they have been great. I use them for running, general workouts, and HIIT classes. One of my pairs is a bit lighter in color and it does show some sweat, but if you're not sweating, you're not working hard enough! This does not bother me at all.
For reference I am 5'9" athletic build, 180 lbs, wear size 10. LOVE THESE TIGHTS!

i´ve been wanting to buy white lulus for sooo long, i already have this style in black so when i saw that i could get them in white i got so excited! i got them in white and size 2 (all of my lulu lemon leggings are size 2) but they are way too small. They barely fit me, they are too tight everywhere, i´m definitely not going to be able to wear them.
Definitely would recommend to go a size up

LuLu are typically my favorite and go to leggings for workout, lounging, hiking, etc. Really liked the speed up look and the thicker grey/black color. When I received these in my normal size 4, that were EXTREMELY tight. I tripled checked I had the right size. There was very little “give” and not something I could wear for exercise. Pretty bummed as I was planning on wearing them this weekend.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey RosieRunner17,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. It sounds like your Speed Up Tight 28" is not providing the right fit. We stand behind our gear and want to make this right. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'February 6, 2019'}

column6:
These pants run EXTREMELY small. I normally get a size 2 in pants. (I'm 5'2 - 105lbs) for reference. These pants basically hurt after putting on because they are so tight.
I wouldn't suggest, however if you do purchase, buy 10 sizes up..
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear Laurb,\n\nThank you for taking the time to review the Speed Up Tight *28". We want you to know, feedback is at the heart of everything we do and we\'d love to make this experience right for you. To carry on this conversation, we\'ve sent you a follow up email. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'February 5, 2019'}

column6: I always size 2 but this one runs really small and thight that i cant breath in it..and it has two side pockets that makes u look bigger

I have the speed up crops and thought I would love the full length version. My husband bought me a pair for Christmas and they are SO much tighter than my crops in the same size. I wore them a few times to see if maybe I would learn to love them. Can't say I'm a fan.
I always get an 8 in the crops and bought the same size in the full length ones.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear Kham,\n\nThank you for taking the time to review the Speed Up Tight *28". We want you to know, feedback is at the heart of everything we do and we\'d love to make this experience right for you. To carry on this conversation, we\'ve sent you a follow up email. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'January 30, 2019'}

column6:
I wear a 2 in lululemon but size up to a 4 because i like a little bit of room. I ordered these pants in a 4 & should’ve went up another size to a 6. They are so tightly & uncomfortable that every time I put them
on I have to turn around & take them right back off. I’m 5’6” 115 lbs for reference.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey bossbay,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. It sounds like your Speed Up Tight 28" is not providing the right fit. We stand behind our gear and want to make this right. Give us a call at our Guest Education Centre (1.877.263.9300) or jump on Live Chat to speak directly with an educator. We look forward to speaking with you soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'January 29, 2019'}

column5: loved but now has a hole in the crotch..
column6: I loved loved loved these leggings, but they started pilling in the crotch, which soon turned into a hole in the crotch. Although they're super cute (I've gotten so many compliments) the quality is not the best.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey Tay123,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm sorry to hear your Speed Up Tight is pilling. We stand behind our gear and we'd love to get in touch. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'January 29, 2019'}

column6: I don't like the fact that you can see when I sweat. :(
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear Stirg,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I am sorry to hear that your Speed Up Tight *28" is not performing as you hoped it would be. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'January 27, 2019'}

column6: I had originally bought the Spped up Tight *28 in the dark heathered gray but disliked the material. It was different than what I had expected and didn’t feel soft at all. I immediately went to my local lululemon and exchanged these pair for the light heathered gray color and have been loving those. Overall, I love them but am still confused as to why the material on the dark heathered gray pair is different to those on the light heathered gray ones.
These seem to run a little smaller than some of their other leggings. I love the color and the fit, but if you are close to between sizes, definitely size up in this pant.

These leggings were my first from Lulu and I had high expectations for the price. They exceeded all of my expectations. They are snug but not constricting and cute but practical. From school to yoga and running they are my go-to pair. I would recommend to anyone who is searching for a fashionable, quality, comfortable pair of leggings.

I've always been the exact same size in all my lulu leggings. These ones fit amazing on the legs, but like so many others have said the waistband is uncomfortably tight, with no give or stretch to it. Very disappointing.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear Akroberts1287,\n\nThank you for taking the time to review the Speed Up Tight *28". I completely understand why you\'re disappointed with this and I\'d love to help turn this around. To carry on this conversation, we\'ve sent you a follow up email. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'January 25, 2019'}

column6: After a few washes, followed by instructions the butt has slight holes in it and there is pilling in a few places. I was so shocked and upset to see this because I take really good care of my lululemons and this has never happened to me before. Wouldn't recommend..
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear cabanabanana,\n\nThanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us! We stand behind the quality of our product, and we want to ensure that you're in gear that is performing well for you. I hear that this is not the case and would like to work with you to create a resolution. Please keep an eye on your inbox as I'll be reaching out shortly to connect.", 'LL_response_date': 'January 21, 2019'}

column6: I really like these leggings. I love the pocket because you always need one and I love the material. It’s almost like a silver metallic color and the material feels weird but it’s very comfy. Definitely like them!

These are warm leggings. I sized up from my normal 6 to an 8 because there isn’t as much stretch due to the fabric. They are so cozy so if it’s a cooler day and you are out to exercise, these are the ones to wear.
Fit is great in the legs, but very tight in the waist and pelvis. No give.

I purchased these pants about a year ago in a black and grey pattern. At first they were great pants but after a few washes the material completely stretched out. The high waist band rolls down when you wear them and it is very annoying having to keep pulling the pants up as you work out. These pants are not worth the money!

I love these pants! They are super comfortable and also cute. They start to fall down the more I wear them, so I am not really able to work out in them, but I love to wear them when I am out running errands. The pockets on the side are my favorite part of this pant. I definitely recommend!

column5: Best Lulu work out pants ever made!
column6: I love these pants! TTS, I wear a 6 and the fit is great! They hit just above my belly button and are long enough (I’m 5’9”). The material is strong and smooth. I seriously love these pants, I have them in 4 colors now!

column5: Not a fan of the fabric
column6: I loved the pattern, but the weaved fabric was uncomfortable to me. I also didn’t feel enough compression. I had to return them.

I have several pairs of speed tights and crops and always wear a sz 4. Ordered the purple and was disappointed with the fit. Fabric is great but the waistband is tight. Sizing up is not an option as when I tried on the 6 in the same color the legs were loose. Beautiful color but fit was horrible and inconsistent.

These are my favorite lulu tights! I love the pockets and the weight of the fabric! They are not listed as high waisted but on me they are (I guess I must have short legs). I would definitely buy then again.

i ordered these in the black and gray print which is a big change from my ALL black collection. i really like them a lot. they fit a little more snug. next time, i might consider ordering a size up. otherwise, i have really enjoyed them so far.

Bought these pants/tights for trail running. They are not as breathable as cotton leggings, but a better investment in the long-term, as they won't fall apart so quickly. They are also more insulated and appropriate for colder months. Pockets are perfect for storing house/car keys/bike lock keys/etc.
I wore these leggings for one day and there is already a hole in them! I will be returning them
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear Senna,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear that the Speed Up Tight *28" is not performing for you. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'January 5, 2019'}

column5: Good for a while, but hole at the seam
column6: When I purchased these leggings, my usual size (6) was out of stock, so I went ahead and ordered the 8. While they were a little big, I still enjoyed them and wore them. However, I have not been able to wear them for quite some time now as there is a hole in the seam of the leg and I do not want to risk making the hole larger.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear Brinn,\n\nThanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us! We stand behind the quality of our product, and we want to ensure that you're in gear that is performing well for you. I hear that this is not the case and would like to work with you to create a resolution. Please keep an eye on your inbox as I'll be reaching out shortly to connect.", 'LL_response_date': 'January 6, 2019'}

column6: 5'3". 125-130 pounds. Size 6. Lazurite as bright as pictured on website. Not too sheer. Good fit for my height. Would recommend.

This is my first pair of speed up tights and will not be my last. I have a few pairs of tight as tight pants and these have a bit more give but not much. I have the bright blue lazr color and at first thought my usual 6 was too tight but when I tried the 8 on they were lose and knew I would be pulling them up during work outs. the side pockets are a MUST these days and love the position of the pocket. I ran 5 miles today and did NOT have to pull them up once.

I am very disappointed with this purchase. I have always purchased size 4 (5'6" and 118lbs) for all of my lululemon gear, and it always fits me perfectly. I bought these as a 4, and the legs fit me alright, but the waistband is so tight it hurts to wear these. I wish I had tried these on before taking the tags off because now I have these pants that I can't wear as they are so tight around the waist they hurt and I cannot return/exchange them. Overall the fabric is amazing and I love how they fit my legs, but please learn from me and try these on in a size or two higher than you would typically buy.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear MissMegan,\n\nThank you for taking the time to review the Speed Up Tight *28". We want you to know, feedback is at the heart of everything we do and we\'d love to make this experience right for you. We\'ll be following up via email to discuss this further. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'December 31, 2018'}

column6: These pants are fantastic. They fit so amazingly and there are so many little pockets that allow for you to keep your cell phone, keys, or cards if needed. I also would recommend for anyone traveling. So many discreet pockets and very comfortable.

I wear size 4 for other Lulu's products, but this pair really runs tight, especially the waist area. I found the waist band digging into my stomach, even when I'm on a flat stomach, it's still pretty comfortable. I am pretty slim, weighing 110lb at 5'7.5'', and usually wear 25'' or 26'' pants comfortably, but I feel like having trouble breathing somehow in this pair... Again, it's the waist band running too tight and the rest hugs my legs ok. Definitely recommend sizing up as many others have already stated.

I really really enjoy these pants. They are very snug so you don't have to worry about them falling down. The only SLIGHT issue I have is they let quite a bit of cold air through so they are a little chilly in the winter. But, I'm sure they will be great for the summer!!

At first, these leggings were awesome! After a few uses they started to become much looser halfway through my runs to the extent that I would have to pull them up every few minutes. I have had the leggings for about 6 months and just found a hole in the back.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear MNrunner3,\n\nThank you for taking the time to review the Speed Up Tight *28". We want you to know, feedback is at the heart of everything we do and we\'d love to make this experience right for you. We\'ll be following up via email to discuss this further. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'December 11, 2018'}

column5: Great at first, terrible later on
column6: I loved these tights when I first bought them! They were my go-to, especially since the weather started to change & I needed something comfy, yet durable. However, after a few weeks the material quickly deteriorated, and now I hardly use them. I would love to be able to still use them, however, they are so baggy and keep falling down. A sad disappointment. A huge waste of money.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear RunnerGirl44,\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We want your gear to support your sweatiest pursuits, but it sounds this isn’t the case for you. We'll be following up via email to discuss this further. Speak soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'December 10, 2018'}

column6: I love how these leggings feel and wear on me. I find myself putting my hands in my pockets all the time.

column5: See through and show every bit of sweat!
column6: Do not buy these!! I bought the heathered black.. thought I could get away with them being a little on the see through side. They show every bit of sweat! I can't even wear them! Total waste of money.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear AlysonRN,\n\nThank you for taking the time to review the Speed Up Tight *28". I\'m sorry to hear your gear isn\'t performing as expected—I can understand the disappointment. We\'ll be following up via email to discuss this further. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'December 11, 2018'}

column6: I have this in black and they are my favorite pair if pants from Lulu....I got the white and was so excited when they arrived. However they seem to be made differently than the black ones. The panel on the side that makes the pocket on the back us onlynon the pocket. For the white, thecoanel starts at the pocket on thigh and runs down the whole leg. This makes it wrinkle the entire way down. Really annoying and poorly made. Why are they different??
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey Mglg,\n\nWe appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us. We're sorry to read of your recent experience and would love to discuss this further. We'd love to chat with you further to gather more information from you and work towards a resolution. We'll be reaching out via email, so keep your eyes peeled on your inbox.", 'LL_response_date': 'December 2, 2018'}

column6: I finally allowed myself to purchase another pair of lulu leggings, but it was a disappointment. After wearing this to my dance practice for about 2 months once weekly, the legging seam started to fall apart. Also, I see pilling happening inside and outside my leggings even when I followed the care instructions. Overall, I am disappointed in the quality of this pair of leggings.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey Jeii,\n\nWe appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us. We're sorry to read of your recent experience and would love to discuss this further. We'd love to chat with you further to gather more information from you and work towards a resolution. We'll be reaching out via email, so keep your eyes peeled on your inbox.", 'LL_response_date': 'December 2, 2018'}

column5: Size Up and you will LOVE-Squat test APPROVED
column6: I have purchased these before, I believe they updated the cut and/or material because of the strong compression feel-because of this I suggest sizing up. I have run into issues with the compression-fit before (think smacking a biscuit container against the counter) THANK GOODNESS these are NOT like that haha Its a good compression, I am not sure how to explain it. I do think that a lot of the low-star review issues that I have read so far would be fixed by sizing up. I do spin and personal training back to back in these 3 times a week and they are the perfect amount of compression, pass the squat test and keep everything looking the way it should. I would consider myself muscular-curvy. My only complaint is that they have more colors.

I don't know what it is about the material of these, but it is not anything like the Speed Up tights I bought last year. This material does not feel smooth and comfortable against my skin in the way that my older ones do. They feel tight and almost stiff when I know I wear the same size consistently. Also there are already threads coming loose on the inside of the pant legs. It seems like the quality is just not the same as it used to be and I wish I could exchange these honestly. Would not recommend.

At first I was in love with these leggings, they were super comfortable and soft and I loved the fact that they had pockets. I've had them for awhile but quit wearing them because they are shear in the butt area and crotch area. It seems as if the fabric in this area has thinned out a lot. The material doesn't pill which is nice but I don't recommend this legging for squat day!
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear tezzarookahoury,\n\nThanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us! We stand behind the quality of our product, and we want to ensure that you're in gear that is performing well for you. I hear that this is not the case and would like to work with you to create a resolution. Please keep an eye on your inbox as I'll be reaching out shortly to connect.", 'LL_response_date': 'November 28, 2018'}

column6:
Pro's: great snug fit, gray is cute color
Con's: Butt area stretches out after 2hrs of use.
Observation: Drawstring Waist is dis-proportionately tighter than rest of pant. For those who do not have a much smaller waist in proportion to hips, these will be too tight in the waist or too loose in butt and thighs.

These pants unfortunately did not last me long. I purchased them awhile back, and fell in love with them at first, but then the material on the inner leg area started to run thin very quickly and the waistband stretched out! I was very disappointed.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear jojo43,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm super sorry to hear that your Speed Up Tight didn't work out for you. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'November 29, 2018'}

column6: I love the color and the pockets (works great for a phone while running!!). However, I own several pairs of Lululemon leggings in size 4, but these are too tight! I recommend sizing up. Lululemon- am I able to return these??
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear wisconsin2020,\n\nThanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us. We\'re sorry to read of your recent experience with the Speed Up Tight *28" and would love to discuss this further. To carry on this conversation, we\'ve sent you a follow up email. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'November 26, 2018'}

column6: I love the speed pants! They are very sturdy, fitted (size up) and stay in place. If I were to change anything on them it would be a thicker waist band but other than that, they are perfect! They are made very well Please make more colors, I love these pants!

One of my friends had been recommending lululemon leggings to me for over a year, so I purchased these as my first pair of leggings. They fit wonderful, but I was slightly disappointed when I had them taken up a bit because the leggings were too long. I was sad when they ended up being shorter than I wanted, but they felt nice around my waist and thighs so I figured a little ankle showing wasn't a big deal. After I wore them for the first time, the seams at my hips began to rip. I'm very disappointed. I was told that these were the most durable and best quality leggings, but I guess they weren't for me.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey 41my,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. It sounds like your Speed Up Tight 28" has not performed for you. We stand behind our gear and want to make this right. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'November 23, 2018'}

column6: This has to be one of my favorite tights to date. I bought these in a size 10 a few weeks ago and they are still holding strong. They fit quite snug, but the material is very breathable and flexible as well. Being a guy, I did look at the tights available for men, but these ones have definitely won me over. Also, a major plus is the side pockets, perfect for holding onto my phone during my workouts, whether intense or just something light. Would definitely recommend this for anyone that wants a tight but flexible fitting tight!

I am not one to write reviews, especially not a negative review towards a company that I have loyally purchased from for so long. (I just created an account just to write this review). However, this is ridiculous. I have barely had these leggings for a year and a half and sure they started out okay. But through time, the interior waist draw cord snapped, the material is pilling, and there is now a hole in my leggings from when I tripped during a run. My skin wasn't even bruised but my leggings snagged. I have never machine washed or dried these leggings because I know how delicate they are. But shouldn't they be fine if I gently handwash them? These used to be my favorite leggings. Such a disappointment.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey RunnerGal23,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear your Speed Up Tight 28"is not performing for you. We stand behind our gear and want to make this right. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'November 20, 2018'}

column6: I sent these to my friend and he actually got these for me as a birthday present. they are kinda thick, do you do get kinda hot in them. they're tight on the bottom but loose on top. I expected them to fit like the fast and free very light and fit perfectly. I do like the design, I wish the pockets were a little bigger, you can't really fit your phone in it. I'm not a fan of them
Very comfortable and great fit.
They fit so nice and I could move around in them without feeling discomfort. They’re so great and hug my body so nice !! Plus they’re stylish too , and they are great for cold running days !!

I love these leggings for casual wear. I have lulu leggings that I wear to work out and then I have a set that I wear for non work out. These I put in the non work out category. I recommend you size down in these leggings. I wear a size 4 in all lululemon leggings except the align leggings. I wear a size 2 in align. These are more comfortable type leggings in my mind, not high performing for work out. They do not have the compression that the other leggings have. I still love them but I wouldn’t recommend for working out.
I bought these leggings as a gift to myself for graduation. Originally, the leggings help up nicely and fit beautifully, but over time the pockets seemed to have stretched out.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey fastliketheflash,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear about the retention issues you\'re experiencing with the Speed Up Tight *28", that is a bummer. We\'d love to make this right! Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'November 10, 2018'}

column6:
I had a pair of old speed ups that I had for a couple years. I LOVED them. I always rolled them up when I wore them so I brought them to get hemmed. When I went to the store to pick them up, I was told that they LOST MY PANTS. I was given a brand new pair as a replacement. (Both pairs are a size 6)
The new ones are so different than the ones I previously had. The waistband has no stretch; it’s a struggle to get them over my hips, and once I get them on they dig into my side. They are also see-through. I tried sizing up, but the 8’s were too big. When I work out in them, they do not stay put, so I am constantly adjusting them. I expect more from lululemon as far as quality and comfort of their clothing, and not losing my pants when I bring them in for alterations.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey volleyball8,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear your Speed Up Tight 28" is not performing for you. We stand behind our gear and want to make this right. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'November 7, 2018'}

column6: I got these pants about a year ago and they have multipule snags on them after just wearing couple times along with them not fitting like the size they say they are.
column9: 20430 JOHNSON MEMORIAL DR, JORDAN, MN 55352, USA
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey nicole11,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear your Speed Up Tight 28" has not held up. We stand behind our gear and we\'d love to get in touch. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'October 30, 2018'}

column6:
I thought Luxtreme is a little thicker and compressive so It would be great. However, It's SEE THROUGH even I wear black/grey underwear.
All my activewear are from Lululemon and always think that LLL has better quality than other brands. They are soft and comfy but I will not buy such expensive and see-through leggings.
Btw, I bought the leggings with the correct size. I measured myself and try a size up, SEE THROUGH!
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey JaniceFoong,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I\'m sorry to hear your Speed Up Tight 28" is appearing as sheer. We stand behind our gear and want to make this right. Give us a call at our Guest Education Centre (1.877.263.9300) or jump on Live Chat to speak directly with an educator. We look forward to speaking with you soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'October 24, 2018'}

column6: I have been looking for the perfect pair of white leggings! I thought this style would be it based on other reviews but NO!!! The style of these leggings is terrible in the white color! I’m thin and average height but these pants made me look short and fat. They are not see thru but unless you have an inseam of like, 35” these are not flattering! I even ordered one size up because of them being white, but just no. They are awful.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey Europegirl21,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us and I'm sorry to hear that these leggings are not performing for you-we'd love to make this right! Give us a call at our Guest Education Centre (1.877.263.9300) or jump on Live Chat to speak directly with an educator. We look forward to speaking with you soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'October 24, 2018'}

column6: DO NOT GET THE GREY IF YOU SWEAT. These pants are very cute but are VERY tight when you first put them on. After running for a bit, they warm up and will loosen but will loosen a little too much. The material started to gather behind my knees, making my run very uncomfortable. After my run I looked down at my crotch and noticed it looked like I soiled myself!!! These pants do not wick sweat!!!!! (at least the grey color does not).
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi climbergirl24,\n\nWe appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us. I’m sorry to see you’re having some trouble with your gear—that's definitely disappointing. We'd love to learn more and make things right for you, so keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Talk soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'October 20, 2018'}

column6: I love these so much that I bought three pairs! The pockets on the side are so convenient and make such the difference. I was a little hesitant to purchase them because of the price, but it is well worth it!

I love these leggings, great to throw on and go. I love that there is a pocket for my phone. Great for a workout or when I’m running my kids around! They make my legs and butt look amazing as well! Woo hoo

I was excited about these for running as well as training, since I like to mix it up, and thought that these would work well for both. These are great for running, especially with all the pockets and the length is good, and the material feels great (they run a little bit on the smaller side, but they still work well and fit like a dream). However, they really can't be worn to the gym, especially for leg workouts or spin classes because with any kind of bending the waistband REALLY digs in, beyond just looking bad and making them so uncomfortable they're really unwearable, even just for going to class.
The perfect tight with a cell phone pocket!! Love the thickness and fit so much I ordered them in 3 colors!

I bought these because they are tight at the ankle which is good for biking. They were warm enough to bike or run when its cold but also good to wear to the gym for pilates or weight training, convenient with all the pockets and comfortable. I'm 5'8" 140 lbs, the size 6 were perfect
A bit tight then regular one. Looks great. Feels great

These leggings have a fabulous extra layer and are super tight, which is my favorite kind of tight. My only hesitation is getting them dirty and so I didn't stick with them but if I had money to burn on leggings I would buy these in a heart beat.
column15: lululemon white fabric has a history of staining

column6: I was so excited to get these. The fabric seems to be a great thickness and the pockets could be super helpful. But the waistband is way too tight. I usually fit a 4 or 2 and the waist is usually too big but the wait on these hurts and digs into your stomach. After 1 wear the thread started to unravel all over the seams, inside and out. After paying more than $100 on these pants, I'm very disappointed.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear SoccerGirl12,\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We’re sorry to hear you're having such trouble with your pants! We’d love to chat with you further about this and find a resolution. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way!", 'LL_response_date': 'September 19, 2018'}

column6: This was my first pair of Speed it up tights and I had very high hopes after all the reviews. I loved the printed color I got. Unfortunately this is my first pair of lululemon tights I really don't like, even to a point that I have not worm them outside of my house more than once. They are very see through when I bend down and that is something I did not notice in the store. Also my pair of tights are uncomfortably tight. I bought them anyways because I though they would relax after wearing them for yoga, sadly they did not. I then went inside the store and tried another pair in the same exact size and they were very comfortable. I guess it was just my pair that was not made right.
Was in search of a white tight and these fit the bill perfectly!
Great leggings, fit wonderfully and move with you. They don't need readjusting during a workout. They are thin but definitly not see through at all. 10/10 would recommend
Love these for a run. Not see through at all, and the light color is so fun. No issues holding my iPhone in the side pocket.
column15: material can get a little hot

column6: The interior waist drawcord is too tight. I ordered my usual size and they fit perfectly except that the drawstring is so tight I can barely get them on. There is no stretch to the drawstring and for someone with hips wider than my waist the drawstring need to be way more adjustable. I’ll be sticking with some other styles over this one.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hi Katie2300,\nWe\'d love to hear more of your experience with your Speed Up Tight 28". Please keep an eye on your inbox as we\'ll be reaching out shortly to connect. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'August 22, 2018'}

column6: These leggings are very cute and extremely comfortable. They fit well. I love the drawstring and the pockets. The pants stay up and are flattering. However, the pair I have are extremely see through. Even with white or nude underwear, you can still see through them. The only area that is not see through is where the side pockets are, because they seem to be double lined in that area for the pocket. Also, after only wearing them a few times, the stitching is coming undone in a few places, and in other places the stitching looks fuzzy/hairy. I love the fit and style of these, but I am disappointed based on how much money I spent on them. Maybe a darker color would be less see through.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear crick,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We\'re sorry to hear that the stitching has come undone on your Speed Up Tight *28". We would love to discuss your concerns further. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'August 16, 2018'}

column6: I love these tights!!!! I have three pairs of these and I love that they stay tight and are not see through. I use them to run and lift weights or for everyday use. They are my favorite
Love these!! Great fit, love the pockets on the side!

I was so excited about these leggings because they were so cute and I loved the color! The feel of these leggings was great, but I was disappointed that they were see through both while squatting and while standing. Unfortunate because I expect more from lulu leggings. Too late to return them.

I’ve started buying these pants instead of the All the Right Places Pant, I like the more snug waistband and the zipper pocket In the back. They hold their shape very well and can often be reworn at least twice before feeling loose.

I am a huge fan of Lulu lemon I always buy here everything and have never been disappointed.
I am 5.2 and weight 110 lb this fits perfect and I run and workout at the gym and this looks perfect !

column5: Too expensive for what you get
column6:
I’ve been eyeing these leggings for a while because they’re always sold out, just like everything else on this site which is frustrating. They are very cute, yes they are looser in the legs and very tight at the waist. I ordered a size 4, I’m 135 5’7 thin/athletic build. I’m keeping them because I love the color and will never find any other leggings I like because everything is high waisted, which is also annoying. Not everyone wears high waist so I wish lululemon would stock more of these or at least have the option to leave your email for when they are restocked. You’d think they would for the amount they’re making. Or least send some coupons, my God. I would not use these for working out only because they are so delicate but definitely for hanging out, etc.
¯\_(ツ)_/¯
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear swiftFOX26,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm sorry to hear that your swiftFOX26 is not performing for you! Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'July 30, 2018'}

column6: I love these legings and they fit me so well, but after only 2 months they have started pilling. I am disappointed as these were my first pair of pants but i still like them because they are so comfortable. i just wish they didnt pill!!
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Dear RiriG,\n\nWe're sorry to read of your recent experience and would love to discuss this further. Please be sure to give us a call at our Guest Education Centre on 1.877.263.9300 or you can always start a Live Chat with us on our website. We look forward to hearing from you.", 'LL_response_date': 'July 3, 2018'}

column6: These are easily one of my favorite pair of leggings from lululemon. It fits as snug as can be comfortable for me, but I can see others having issues with it as the waistband does fit very tightly. I love how durable the material feels. I work out 6x a week lifting weights and doing cardio and every time I wear these, they fit like the first time I tried them on. Definitely great for high intensity workouts.

Okay, this right here should be marketed as the "mom leggings". I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE that there are multiple pockets on the pant legs. Makes being on the go super easy. My purse is now a backpack filled with butt paste and diapers so having pockets on the pant legs so that I can have my phone and keys easily accessible is KEY.
Not to mention, since being a mom requires less of YOUR stuff on the go, its nice to be able to go to barre in these with just the minimal items... in your pockets!
My one request would be to make a version of these that are slightly thicker so that they are warmer during the winter but when you're a hot and sweaty mess after barre, this pair is perfect.
OH, and for some reason, these are SUPER tight in the waistband compared to the Fast Times 7/8 tights that don't have this issue. I would size up for this reason.

Have some of the older lululemon pants in this style and loved them! They still keep up great, however after getting these ones in the last two months they were very disappointing. Many reviews before said how they were slightly tighter and I decided to go up a size in this pair as well. However they stretch out after a couple washes and when you actually run in them they start to fall down. I will continue to wear my old pair as I search for new running pants. I hope lululemon goes back to how they made their pants a couple years ago those are worth the money.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi Lynn421,\nThanks for taking the time to connect with us and share this feedback. It's not good to hear that your Speed Up Tight has stretched out. We stand behind our gear and I'd love to help you find a fix. Give us a call at our Guest Education Centre (1.877.263.9300) or jump on Live Chat to speak directly with an educator. We look forward to speaking with you soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'June 12, 2018'}

column6:
I have been a loyal Lulu customer for years because of the high quality fabrics HOWEVER this pair of Lulus has started pilling after a few washes. The sides of the pants are turning a fuzzy dark color (I have the heather gray)
I'm really disappointed.
column19:
{'LL_response_content': "Dear Mbmd,

Thanks for making time to share your experience with the Speed Up Tights. I completely understand why you're disappointed with this and I'd love to help turn this around.

We stand behind the quality of our product, and we want to ensure that you're in gear that is performing well for you. I hear that this is not the case and would like to work with you to create a resolution.

We have sent you an email outlining a few options.", 'LL_response_date': 'June 8, 2018'}

column5: stretch out more than any other leggings / see through
column6: bought 2 pairs of these, wanted to love them but they quickly became my least favorite. Regret spending my coins on these when i feel like the wunder unders give better support and arent crazy see through like these. Deffineilty not squat proof, lunge proof ect. save your money
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey bri99999,\n\nThank you for taking the time to review the Speed Up Tight *28". I completely understand why you\'re disappointed with this and I\'d love to help turn this around. We have sent you an email outlining a few options.', 'LL_response_date': 'June 6, 2018'}

column6:
I am a loyal lululemon customer. Up until I purchased these pants, I wouldn't shop any other brand. These pants are so bad that I will now shop any brand except lulu. I tried them on in store and loved them so much that I bought 2 pairs. I exercise about 5 times a week doing weight lifting, cycling and running. I could not make these pants work for any of these exercises. I have 3 main issues with these pants.
First is how bad they stretched out. I own pairs of lulus that are 3+ years old and they still fit like they did when I purchased them. These stretched out to the point that I can no longer wear them. Every time I worked out in these all I could focus on was pulling them up and not letting them sag. It is so frustrating. Towards the end of my workouts I would be unable to pull them up because they would be stuck to my sweaty legs and waist.
Next, the waist of these pants is way too snug. When I tried them on in the store, the employee told me that the waist will fit like that until my first wear and then it will be more comfortable. This did not happen. While it did stretch a little, they are still so snug that it hurts. I got these in my normal size 2. I tried on a 4 and the waist was a better fit but the legs were too big. The employee suggest I stick with the 2 and that it would likely stretch out. Next time Ill be sure to buy pants that fit perfectly when I first try them on.
Last, the pants are coming apart at the seams even though they are fairly new and are only ever air dried after washing. This wasn't as big of a deal to me because I have taken previous pants in to get holes fixed and they were fixed free of charge and haven't fallen apart since. However, this was the icing on top of the cake to the stretching and tight waist band.
After purchasing 2 pairs of these pants and being stuck with them since they are past the return policy, I am very disappointed in lululemon. These pants were my 9th and 10th pair. As mentioned previously, I loved all my pairs and the only problem I have run into is falling apart at the seam which was fixed to perfection for free. I hope in the future that lulu creates more stretch free pants and that they stay true to size as far as waist and leg size.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey saaraahp,\n\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm bummed to hear of the experience you've had with our pants. Please be on the lookout for an email headed your way. It'll detail the next steps to take to resolve this.", 'LL_response_date': 'May 23, 2018'}

column6: Tried both of the white patterned pairs on in store and completely see through. Might be better in other colors.

I hardly ever purchase Lulu tights full priced because, well, I'm frugal. But when I saw these in the wee are from space nimbus battleship color, I HAD to try them. Oh My God. They are the best tights I have ever purchased. I workout hard usually doing hill sprints, cross fit, and spin classes, and these tights stay right in place even through my most intense workout. They fit TTS and stay up perfectly, even if I put my phone and keys in the pockets during a run. Invest in a pair of these babies and you won't be sorry.

column5: The best and last tight you will ever need for intense workouts
column6: I have been meaning to post a review of these tights for a long time. To state that I'm obsessed and in love is an understatement. I own five pairs of these tights. The variegated knit black heathered black one is my absolute favorite. The fabric seems higher quality than the others, but I love them all. The pockets are amazing and easily allow you to work out with your phone or run with doggy bags in the pockets. I have purchased other tights that are meant for compression and recovery and feel that these tights have better compression features than anything I've ever tried, all while being incredibly comfortable. Also nothing makes my butt look better than these tights. And lululemon's customer service really cannot be beat. Love these tights and will continue to buy them. I highly recommend for people who do intense workouts. These are one of the only tights I can run hard in and not have to continue pulling up throughout my run. For reference with sizing, I have a very athletic build, and wear a size 26 in jeans and 4 or 6 in suits and dresses. I purchase this tight in size 4 and it's perfect.

I bought two pairs of these and both of them are very see through on me after only a few washes. They look good which is the worst part because I do love how they look, I just wish I could workout in them without worrying that someone behind me is getting a show.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hi Katherine28,\nWe appreciate your feedback regarding the Speed Up Tight *28". We hear where you\'re coming from and I\'m sorry to hear your pants haven\'t held up for you as expected. Hang tight for an email coming your way! Chat soon.', 'LL_response_date': 'April 30, 2018'}

column5: love the fit especially the pockets!
column6: I am so excited to receive these leggings the fit is perfect. I worn it one time to the gym and washed it in cold, delicate cycle and hang to dry. So far I have no problem with the leggings-- no pilling or fraying in the seams. Additionally, I love that it is really tight in the waist area and it makes my bum look nice. So far it is holding its size.
Do not buy these or waste your money. The leggings are completely see through and thin.. Definitely expected thicker, better material from Lulu, especially for the price :(
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hi Blairy,\nThanks for reaching out and providing this feedback for us. We hear your disappointment with the lack of coverage you’ve noticed on your Speed Up Tight *28". I\'d love to lend a hand and help with some options, so I\'ve sent an email to you outlining the next steps.', 'LL_response_date': 'April 30, 2018'}

column6: I bought the plain black pair a while back in stores and I fell in love! But overtime they do stretch out quite a bit and I also lost some weight so I needed to go down a size so I bought the leggings a size down in the color "Wee Are Space Nimbus Battleship" I have always wanted a brighter pair of leggings! I was so excited to receive these in the mail but as soon as I tried them on I noticed I could see the tag, my underwear and even my skins color through the fabric on my leg! I was so disappointed because I love Lululemon and these leggings but I could not believe they were see through! Yes they are a lighter color but either way I expect more from them being that they are over $100 dollars!
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey kcmm,\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. Oh dear, we definitely don\'t want your Speed Up Tight *28" to be sheer. We\'d love to learn more and make things right for you, so keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'April 18, 2018'}

column6: Seams come apart and the the pants stretch out after a couple wash.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey lulucougar,\nOh no! We definitely hear your disappointment with the performance of your Speed Up Tight *28" and would love to help. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way with some solutions! Chat soon.', 'LL_response_date': 'April 11, 2018'}

column6: I was super excited about these leggings. Love the idea of a pocket as well as a strong hold. Although it completely lost its quality after a wash. So not worth the price. Super disappointed, but they were good the one wear they lasted.

I purchased the nimbus battleship and just received today. Upon trying them on, I noticed that they are completely see through. I love the fit and feel of the tights but showing my underwear and the tag is a dealbreaker. Wishing the fabric was thicker!
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey isugirl95,\nOh no, I'm bummed to hear about the sheerness you're experiencing! We stand behind the quality of our gear and I will be in touch via email to dig into this with you -- chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'April 6, 2018'}

column6: Everything about these is great besides the fact that they're see through :( Idk if it was the color I purchased (heather grey) but I have never had a pair of Lulu's that have been see through, why I'm an avid buyer! I'm a dance teacher so it's not a cute look standing in front of all my students and parents and they can see my underwear lol they're also a little tighter than my normal size 4 I get. But other than that, they're good!
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi choreohayley,\nThanks for taking the time to connect. It doesn't sound right that your gear is see through, so I've sent an email your way with some solutions. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'April 5, 2018'}

column6: I loved the fit and the look of this leggings. I was so exited to work out in them. They felt comfortable at the gym, however, after 1 wear, ONE WEAR, they started peeling. The thigh area started turning a lighter color and after a closer look you can see that they are peeling. so disappointing, especially after hearing people say that lululemon last a lifetime.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey sandramarquez,\nWe appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us. I completely understand why you're disappointed with this and I'd love to help turn this around. Please be on the lookout for an email headed your way. It'll detail the next steps to take to resolve this.", 'LL_response_date': 'April 4, 2018'}

column6: These are my new favorite leggings. Period. I will say, though, that these leggings were a tad bit thicker than I had expected and the pockets do not always lay flat against my leg. Nonetheless, the quality, fit, and style are excellent! Also, I am 5'8," and the length is perfect.

I've been training for a half marathon and I bought these pants because all my others were beginning to slip down while running. These pants didn't even budge during my last 11 mile run and I will definitely be wearing them on race day.
I'm 5'3" and 130 and I got a size 4

I've been wanting a dark green pair of workout leggings for awhile now and when I got the email from lululemon about these new tights I had to get my hands on them and I am in love! I'm 6'0 so it is hard for me to find full length tights and these are a perfect fit. They feel fabulous and the color is spot on. Dark enough that they don't show my sweat when I'm training at Orangetheory and they held up through the whole class. The Evergreen is beautiful but the quality makes me want them in every color now!!

I love these pants! I wear them to run or workout at the gym and they are great. They stay in place, are super comfortable, and perfect for all of my workouts. They fit tight, but I stuck with my normal size and that was the right decision. If the quality would hold up I would buy them in every color. However, on the pair I own the stitching is coming out in the seams and there is some pretty bad pilling. I own a lot of lululemon and always wash everything according to their instructions and I rarely have pilling problems with my lululemon gear. I am disappointed by the seams and pilling, but I was even more disappointed by the customer service in my local store. I took the pants there to see if I could return them, since they are not living up to expectation and they just told me that there was nothing they could do for me. I love lululemon, but I left feeling disappointed and frustrated! I always buy lululemon for the quality and customer service and neither lived up to the expectations in this case!
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hi SAB0605,\nThanks so much for sharing your thoughts today. We stand behind the quality of our gear and will be in touch shortly via email to follow up and help!', 'LL_response_date': 'March 29, 2018'}

column6: I received two pairs of these leggings as a gift, and I couldn't be more pleased with them. I love leggings that give me shape and these do just that! I have my regular size 8 and they were a bit more tight than I would have liked at first, but they have barely stretched to utter perfection. I have not noticed any piling since wearing them (I wear them very very often) and washing them. They are super comfortable to work out it--both in the gym and running. I am waiting until I have a little moolah saved and I will be purchasing more!

column5: Love the fit, but not the fabric
column6:
So these pants are really nice and fitted. I am 5'4" and the length is perfect for me, they hit right at the ankle. I love that there are side pockets, perfect place for your phone. I need pockets for the gym so that was what sold me when I purchased these. There is also a back zipped pocket at the waist, good for credit cards and keys.
The fabric feels great and is really flexible however I only bought these less than a month ago and the fabric is already starting to pill on the leg?? Which is really strange, they are basically new and I've worn them less than 5 times (mostly for school so far) and the fabric is getting worn in on the side pocket. It would make sense if it pilled in the inner thigh, but these are still so new?
And it's on the outer thigh. For the price and the supposed high quality of the fabric, I am pretty disappointed in how long the fabric held up. Some of the stitching is also coming loose. For $108 I expected a lot more from lululemon.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey Nebraska,\nI really appreciate you taking the time to get in touch today and I'm sorry to hear your gear isn't performing for you. We stand behind the quality of our gear and I will be in touch via email to dig into this with you!\nChat soon.", 'LL_response_date': 'March 21, 2018'}

column6: I loved this product! I've been looking for a red colored pair of tights to complete my Lululemon collection! These were great, however if you have short legs, these will surely be too long for you. The bottom scrunches up because my legs are a little too short, but I love them. I am 5'6" about 145 and I ordered a size 6, which fits perfect. It doesn't fall down when I run and the side and back pockets are great for running. I've only ever owned various colors in the pace rival crop but these are great too!

At first I loved these tights. They are super comfortable and cute with good compression. But after only a few months of having them they are pilling. I have followed all of the care instructions and they are still pilling. It seems like every time I wear them it gets worse. I expected higher quality tights for how much I paid for these.
column19:
{'LL_response_content': "Dear Dom95,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us.

We stand behind the quality of our gear, and we’d like to work with you towards a fix for the pilling Speed Up Tight.

Please be on the lookout for an email headed your way. It'll detail the next steps to take to resolve this.", 'LL_response_date': 'March 8, 2018'}

column6:
I bought this in the color Redwood in October. I only wear it maybe twice a week at most to the gym on weightlifting days that do NOT involve much overall movement/stretching at all (i.e. chest day, arm day). By January, the stitching in the crotch area began unravelling and pilling on the hips!
The thing is, this has not happened with any of my four other Lululemon pants--not even to my Speed Up Tight Crop (which I presume to be similar in construction and/or formulation), which I bought the month before and wear more frequently! I'm disappointed because I love the color, design, and fit and I take care of all my Lululemon products.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey KimTee,\nI really appreciate you taking the time to get in touch today and I'm sorry to hear your gear isn't performing for you. We stand behind the quality of our gear and I will be in touch via email to dig into this with you -- chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'March 2, 2018'}

column6: Seriously the best pair of lulu pants I have ever purchased. They are super snug and a little high waisted so they hold everything in place. I am 5'5" 140 poungs, athletic build and I wear a size 6. I wear them everywhere! Nice and thick so I have no fears about being sheer! I want to buy a million pairs of these!

These are now tied with my wunder unders as my favorite leggings. When I first tried them on I thought they were too small (I always wear a 4 in lulu) but I now love the fit! I can run for miles and the waistband on these ensures that they do not start slipping down.

I got these in the Jacquard Black Luna pattern and I love them. They are lightweight and feel smooth on my skin. Don't have to keep pulling them up. I even used them for hot yoga and they did not ride down at all.
I am obsessed with these pants. I wish you made more in this fabric because I would buy them all. They are so comfortable and love that they have a side pocket!

I REALLY wanted to love these tights, they fit great and they're very comfortable BUT they are already pilling at the seams in non-friction areas. I've had them for less than a month and worn them a handful of times so this is so disappointing. The outsides of the calves are pilling at the seems as well as on the fabric itself. Not worth the money if they're going to fall apart after only having them for a month!
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hi ecasey,\nThank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We'd like to turn this around and ensure your gear is providing long-lasting performance for you. Since it sounds like this isn't the case, please keep an eye on your inbox so we can get to work on a solution for you.", 'LL_response_date': 'January 15, 2018'}

column6: These pants are super comfortable, HOWEVER, the seams are coming undone in places that aren't exposed to any friction... like the outside of my calves and ankles. The seams around the pockets are also coming undone. I would recommend the Align Pants! So much more reliable when it comes to seam quality.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey msturtle,\nThanks so much for taking the time to get in touch today and share your thoughts. I definitely hear your disappointment and would love to help. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way with some solutions!\nChat soon.', 'LL_response_date': 'January 3, 2018'}

column5: Great fit, BUT seams are unraveling...
column6: Love these tights, but the seam at the ankle is coming undone. I've had these for about 2 months and wear them when running!
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey mckk,\nThanks for taking the time to share your thoughts with us. I'm sorry to hear the seam on your Speed Up Tight is coming undone—keep an eye out for an email with some solutions coming your way.", 'LL_response_date': 'December 28, 2017'}

column5: I reviewed the other listing of these tights as "starting a collection"...but..
column6:
Each color seems to fit differently, so although I love this tight for several reasons, it's frustrating that the fit varies so much. I have not tried a solid color yet--that is only because of the sweat issue people have mentioned in reviews on the other listing of speed up tights. Sweat does show on prints, especially in the crotch (yes, the unfortunate wet your pants look), but it's somewhat subtle. I usually only wear them for running outside so I don't care, but if it was more obvious or I was at a gym I definitely would.
I'm specifically reviewing the Score Jacquard Black Luna which I just received. I like that they are not white on the inside, so there is no fade over hips and thighs, but when I did a squat test I could see my underwear, but they are not completely see through. I also purchased the Crystalline Multi (other listing of speed ups) and they are bright white on the inside which looked ridiculous over my butt and thighs, because the pockets are the darkest part of the tight as the rest is faded to almost lavender because of the stretch--more so if I squat. Sizing up wouldn't help because the waist would be too big.--Those I can't review because Lulu doesn't let you edit reviews or write new ones for the same item, so I'm including those details here.
Back to the Jacquard--they are more snug than the others I've tried, but I'm keeping them because once I squeezed myself into them they fit fine, it was just getting the tight waist up over my hips. They also seem longer than other pairs I own. I'm 5'5" and the rise seems a little higher too, which is fine since I'll be using them for running, spin and probably bootcamp--depending how sweat shows. My only concern right now is that the Jacquard feels like it could snag or pull on the inside--as it has texture that could easily be snagged by a fingernail, the texture is different then all the other speed up tights I own and they feel a little warmer.
column15: most prints are bright white on the inside
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey yogirunaholic,\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback. I'd love to get a bit more information on your experience and look into some options. An email is headed your way, so keep an eye out. Chat soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'December 26, 2017'}

column6: They were really good, wore them a few weeks then they got a rip in the butt next to the seam and I got them repaired by LULU and they ripped again and look worse now. The fabric seems very thin and not durable.
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Hey sydthekid110,\nThanks so much for sharing your thoughts today. We hear your disappointment and will be sending an email your way to follow up and lend a helping hand.\nSpeak soon.', 'LL_response_date': 'December 19, 2017'}

column6: I have at least 15 pairs of Lulu leggings and these are now my favorite, which says a lot! I bought these last week, because it is getting colder and the material felt warmer than my usual Lulu leggings. I love the hugging fit and they actual did end up being a bit warmer than my other pairs, now I want to wear them everyday. I get so many compliments on these! Highly recommended!!!

They were great until wearing them less than 5 times, I discovered a hole in the butt of the pants! I don't know if I am able to return them or exchange them but I am very disappointed! I hope that this will somehow get resolved.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey kklake,\nWe hear your disappointment with the hole you're experiencing on your gear and will be sending an email your way so we can dig into this with you.", 'LL_response_date': 'November 29, 2017'}
